com.engine.main

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.main.Core
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    Core


    Version: 1.2

    Core handles all engine components and acts like a "bridge" between them. All engine components are accessed through this class.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        An optional clock. Disabled by default, to enable, change the variable 'running' in the start method to true.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • tick

        public void tick()
        An optional update method controlled by the optional clock. Disabled by default. See run() to enable.

      • render

        public void render()
        An optional render method controlled by the optional clock. Disabled by default. See run() to enable.

      • start

        public void start()
        Run this core in a new Thread and start that Thread.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the optional clock from running.

        Parameters:
        mouseMoveCount - the mouseMoveCount to set

      • updateMouseCount

        public void updateMouseCount()
        Update the count of mouseMoveCount. This is triggered every time the mouse moves. If this stops incrementing, then the mouse is not moving.
